channel.title: Help please!
channel.description:
Hello, i wanted to add a new skill (Dungeoneering) to my PI based server, i have added everything except the levels, im not sure how to make it grant exp when i have finished a room and also i need to add the actual skill too because so far my dungeoneering is basically a minigame :(
Please help if possible
Many thanks
